definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Always drink when you are thirsty, and have water available during the day to hydrate regularly.
sentences.chinese: 總是喝當你渴了，有水可在白天到水合物定期。

sentences.english: An improved precipitation system is provided for the Bayer process production of alumina hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 改進的降水系統提供的氧化鋁水合物拜耳法生產。

sentences.english: In the end, the author hopes it may provide some useful clues to the exploration of gas hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 企望對加速天然氣水合物的勘探提供一些有益的線索。

sentences.english: Hydrates are formed as the condensate and water fall to the lower liquid section.
sentences.chinese: 在凝析液和水落入分離器下部液體段時形成水合物。

sentences.english: The altiplano tundra is a potential source of the formation and preservation of nature gas hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 高原凍土帶是天然氣水合物生成和保存的潛在源區。

sentences.english: The salt-removing effect during formation of gas hydrate was dominated by methane consumption.
sentences.chinese: 水合物生成引起的排鹽效應主要取決於耗氣量。

sentences.english: Sugar-laden juices and sodas don't count as proper hydration.
sentences.chinese: 不要認爲富含糖分的飲料和汽水是恰當的水合物。

sentences.english: Gas hydrate is commonly called flammable ice, methane ice, methane hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 天然氣水合物俗稱可燃冰，甲烷水合物。

sentences.english: Gas hydrate is commonly called flammable ice, methane ice, methane hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 天然氣水合物俗稱可燃冰，甲烷水合物。

sentences.english: NASA says this image shows possible hydrate-rich terrain.
sentences.chinese: 美國宇航局說，這個圖片顯示可能水合物豐富的地形。

sentences.english: Gas hydrate is a kind of ice -like clathrate hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 氣體水合物是一類籠形結構的冰狀晶體。

sentences.english: Natural gas hydrate is a kind of simple crystalloid solid hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 天然氣水合物是一種結晶狀固態簡單化合物。

sentences.english: Gas hydrate is a kind of ice clathrate hydrate.
sentences.chinese: 氣體水合物是一類籠形結構的冰狀晶體。

sentences.english: When that hydration comes from pure, clean water -- not liquids such as soda or even soup -- experts say skin cells rejoice.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚細胞喜歡這些水合物來自純淨的水而非汽水或湯。

sentences.english: To determine the effects of heating a sample of Dextrose Monohydrate.
sentences.chinese: 以確定影響暖氣的樣本，葡萄糖一水合物。

sentences.english: The heating coil melts the hydrates and partially stabilizes the hydrocarbon liquids.
sentences.chinese: 加熱盤管融化水合物並使烴液部分穩定。

definition: to de-absorb/to get a chemical out of solution
deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
